noun.description: A sheet of information in the form of a table, graph, or diagram.
examples: a chart showing how much do-it-yourself costs compared with retail

verb.description: (of a record) enter the weekly music charts at a particular position.
examples: the record will probably chart at about No. 74

origin: Late 16th century: from French charte, from Latin charta paper, papyrus leaf (see card).
